original_text: “Then lie on your left side and put the sin of the people of Israel upon yourself. You are to bear their sin for the number of days you lie on your side.
korean_text: 너는 또 왼쪽으로 누워 이스라엘 족속의 죄악을 짊어지되 네가 눕는 날수대로 그 죄악을 담당할지니라

sentences.original_text: Then lie on your left side
and put the sin of the people of Israel upon yourself
You are to bear their sin
for the number of days you lie on your side
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 옆으로 눕는 날 수 동안에
